definition: someone who is unable to walk normally because of an injury or disability to the legs or back, to deprive of the use of a limb, especially a leg
details:
noun
- someone who is unable to walk normally because of an injury or disability to the legs or back
verb
- to deprive of the use of a limb, especially a leg
= example: to deprive of the use of a limb, especially a leg
= synonyms: lame
- to deprive of strength or efficiency
= synonyms: stultify
